disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Illumination.

blurb.value: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

description.value: Innate: Lux's damaging abilities mark enemies with light energy for 6 seconds.

description2.value: Lux's basic attacks and Final Spark consume the mark to deal 20 − 190 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield prevents Final Spark from igniting Illumination. The on-hit damage from Illumination via basic attack cannot be blocked by spell shield. PENDING FOR TEST: Parry interactions ( dodge, block, blind).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Light Binding.

target range.value: 1300

width.value: 140

blurb.value: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

description.value: Active: Lux releases a sphere of light in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit and roots them for 2 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Targets protected by a spell shield or are crowd control immune count towards Light Binding's two-target limit. Light Binding will cast from wherever Lux is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Prismatic Barrier.

target range.value: * 1175

effect radius.value: 110

width.value: 220

blurb.value: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

description.value: Active: Lux launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.

description2.value: Lux and allied champions touched by the outgoing wand are shielded for 2.5 seconds.

description3.value: Allied champions near the return location and those touched by the returning wand are shielded for the same amount and for the same duration, stacking with the previous shield and resetting its remaining duration.

description4.value: The shields can only stack up to 2 times. Additional shields will neither reset the duration nor strengthen it.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Like most missiles, both of Primsatic Barrier cannot hit units whose center is beyond the missile range or behind its origin, even if their hitbox radius overlaps. At the return location, this behaviour is overridden by an additional center check with the same diameter as the missile width. If Lux dies before her wand returns it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range. Lux's wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back. Prismatic Barrier is always fired from the original casting position. Prismatic Barrier is destroyed by Wind Wall and Blade Whirl but not Unbreakable.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Lucent Singularity.

blurb.value: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

description.value: Active: Lux sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target area for up to 5 seconds, slowing enemies inside and granting a 600 radius vision around it. Lucent Singularity can be recast at no delay.

description2.value: At the end of the duration or if Lucent Singularity is reactivated, the area detonates, dealing magic damage.

description3.value: Recast: Lux detonates Lucent Singularity early. If recast while in flight, the ability will detonate on arrival.

description4.value: The slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the area. Enemies hit by Lucent Singularity are slowed for 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Detonating the ability manually does not. Lucent Singularity grants sight while also in flight.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Final Spark.

blurb.value: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

description.value: Active: Lux fires a massive laser of light in a line in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies hit, briefly revealing enemies as well as the surrounding area.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Final Spark is always fired from the original casting position. Type Cast time Attacking Disabled Abilities Lucent Singularity can only be recast if it is present. Light Binding and Prismatic Barrier are disabled. Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death, unless protected by Resurrection
